Translations.Text: Qui utter bene words than unus invites DEUS works righteousness dictus ego est 1 de submitters
Non aequalis est bonus response malus response. Vos resort nicest possible response. Sic unus used est tuus enemy maius become tuus bene friend
Nullus attain hoc those steadfastly persevere Nullus attain hoc those est extremely fortunate
When devil whispers idea vos vos seek refuge DEUS. He est Hearer Omniscient
Among His proofs est nox feria sun moon Non prostrate sun nor moon vos fall prostrate DEUS created them vos enim worship Eum alone
they est too arrogant perfecit hoc tunc those tuus Dominus glorify Eum nox feria sine ever tiring
Among His proofs est ut vos vide terra adhuc tunc prout soon prout nos shower it aqua it vibrates vita! Surely Unus revived it revive peritus. He est Omnipotent
Surely those distort noster revelations non hidden nos. Unus gets thrown Hell bene unus advenit secure Feria Resurrection? Perfecit whatever vos wish He est Seer de everything vos perfecit
Those rejected Quran's proof when it advenit them alias rejected Prenobilis book
Non falsehood iniit it in the elapsus in the future revelation ex Wise Praiseworthy
Quod est dictus to vos est precisely quod est dictus to proximus messengers! Tuus Dominus possesses forgiveness He alias possesses painful retribution

Nos factus it non-Arabic Quran they dictus perfecit it advenit in ut language? Whether est Arabic non-Arabic dictus those believe it est guide healing Prout pro those disbelieve they est surdus blind it prout they addressed ex faraway
